Package de.oth.blocklib.networking.nio

Class NioNetworkConnection

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.networking.nio.NioNetworkConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkConnection
public class NioNetworkConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkConnection
NetworkConnection implementation for endpoints using NetworkLayerType.NIO.
This class represents a connection between two endpoints.
Author:
Matthias Wagner
See Also:
NetworkConnection

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private static class  NioNetworkConnection.ReliablePacketTransmission
    Class used for storing a reliable packet together with additional information.

    • send

      void send​(NetworkPacket networkPacket)
      Sends a NetworkPacket to the remote endpoint and queues the packet for retransmission if needed.
      Parameters:
      networkPacket - the packet to be sent

    • resetRetransmissionTimeout

      private void resetRetransmissionTimeout()

    • rawSend

      private void rawSend​(NetworkPacket networkPacket)
      Sends a NetworkPacket. If the packet is a ReliableNetworkPacket this method just sends it. It does not queue the packet up for retransmission.
      Parameters:
      networkPacket - the packet to be sent

    • refuse

      void refuse()
      Notifies the remote endpoint that the connection was refused.

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Description copied from interface: NetworkConnection
      Return whether the connection is intact.
      This depends on whether data was received from the remote endpoint in the last Configuration.connectionAliveTimeout milliseconds. If Configuration.connectionAliveTimeout is 0, this method returns true.
      Specified by:
      isConnected in interface NetworkConnection
      Returns:
      true if the two endpoints are still connected
